title: Android 13 Developer Preview 2 hands-on: Top new features [Video]
content:
It’s hard to believe that a month after the first developer-focused build, Android 13 Developer Preview 2 is now available with a whole host of new features and functions. Here is a shortlist of some of the best.

more…

description: We've ranked all of the best new features that have been added to Google Pixel devices as part of the Android 13 Developer Preview 2.
